name: fortinet-fortirecon-brand-protection
label: Fortinet FortiRecon Brand Protection
description: FortiRecon is a Digital Risk Protection Service (DRPS) product that provides an outside-the-network view to the risks posed to your enterprise.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server name or IP address to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: org_id
fields.title: Organization ID
fields.description: The organization ID on which FortiRecon operations are to be performed.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Code Repo Exposures
operations.description: Retrieves list of code repo exposures based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: q
parameters.title: Search By Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Filter code repo exposures by searching the specified keyword on attribute field.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter code repo exposures by searching the specified keyword on attribute field.

parameters.name: matched_domain
parameters.title: Matched Domain
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific matched domain(s). Multiple matched domains should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific matched domain(s). Multiple matched domains should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: domain1.com,domain2.com

parameters.name: risk_level
parameters.title: Risk Level
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific risk level(s). Multiple risk levels should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific risk level(s). Multiple risk levels should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: LOW,MEDIUM,HIGH

parameters.name: attribute_type
parameters.title: Attribute Type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific attribute type(s). Multiple attribute types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific attribute type(s). Multiple attribute types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: Email,Password

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter code repo exposures by status.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter code repo exposures by status. You can select one of the following options: Active, Ignored, Resolved

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Domain Threats
operations.description: Retrieves list of code domain threats based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: q
parameters.title: Search By Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Filter domain threats by searching the specified keyword in domain, url, severity, original_domain, online_status, fuzzer fields.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter domain threats by searching the specified keyword in domain, url, severity, original_domain, online_status, fuzzer fields.

parameters.name: original_domain
parameters.title: Original Domain
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific original domain(s). Multiple matched domains should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific original domain(s). Multiple matched domains should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: domain1.com,domain2.com

parameters.name: tags
parameters.title: Tags
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific tag(s). Multiple tags should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific tag(s). Multiple tags should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: b7c4409f4e34eedc7a5447b077732c66,b7c4409f4e34eedc7a5447b077732c77

parameters.name: online_status
parameters.title: Online Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter domain threats by online status.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter domain threats by online status. You can select one of the following options: Online, Not Available, Non Functional, Offline

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter domain threats by status.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter domain threats by status. You can select one of the following options: Active, Ignored, Resolved

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Domain Threats By ID
operations.description: Retrieves details of domain threat based on the ID that you have specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Domain Threat ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify an ID of the domain threat to get its details.
parameters.description: Specify an ID of the domain threat to get its details.

operations.title: Get Executive Exposures
operations.description: Retrieves list of executive exposures based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: source_type

parameters.tooltip: Filter executive exposure by source type.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter executive exposure by source type.

parameters.name: executive_id
parameters.title: Executive ID
parameters.tooltip: Filter executive exposure by executive ID.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter executive exposure by executive ID.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by report added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by report added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile report date. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by report added date. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Executive Profiles
operations.description: Retrieves list of executive profiles based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Executive Name
parameters.tooltip: Filter executive profile by executive name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter executive profile by executive name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

operations.title: Get Open Bucket Exposures
operations.description: Retrieves list of open bucket exposures based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: q
parameters.title: Search By Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Filter open bucket exposures by searching the specified keyword in bucket, file_name fields.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter open bucket exposures by searching the specified keyword in bucket, file_name fields.

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.title: File Type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific file type(s). Multiple file types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific file type(s). Multiple file types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: gz,docx

parameters.name: bucket_type
parameters.title: Bucket Type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific bucket type(s). Multiple bucket types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific bucket type(s). Multiple bucket types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: gcp,aws,azure

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter open bucket exposures by status.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter open bucket exposures by status. You can select one of the following options: Active, Ignored, Resolved

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Rogue Apps
operations.description: Retrieves a list of Rogue Apps based on the status and keywords that you have specified for the query; rogue apps are mobile applications trying to look like apps from trusted brands.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the rogue app's status type from the following options to filter the results: Unofficial: Apps published by users that are not recognized officially, RogueApps: These are the unofficial apps deemed to be potentially malicious.
parameters.tooltip: Select the rogue app's status type from the following options to filter the results. You can select one of the following options: Unofficial, RogueApps

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.title: Search By Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific keyword. Provided keyword will be searched in these fields: Keyword, Source Name, Developer Name, App Name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific keyword. Provided keyword will be searched in these fields: Keyword, Source Name, Developer Name, App Name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Default page is 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Default page is 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Rogue App By ID
operations.description: Retrieves details of a rogue app based on the Rogue App ID that you have specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Rogue App ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify an ID of the rogue app to get its details.
parameters.description: Specify an ID of the rogue app to get its details.

operations.title: Get Social Media Threats
operations.description: Retrieves list of social media threats based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.name: q
parameters.title: Search By Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Filter social media threats by searching the specified keyword in profile_name, handle_name fields.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter social media threats by searching the specified keyword in profile_name, handle_name fields.

parameters.name: media_type
parameters.title: Media Type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by specific media type(s). Multiple media types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific media type(s). Multiple media types should be comma separated and will work as OR filter. eg: FACEBOOK,INSTAGRAM,TWITTER

parameters.name: profile_name
parameters.title: Profile Name
parameters.tooltip: Filter social media threats by profile name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter social media threats by profile name.

parameters.name: handle_name
parameters.title: Handle Name
parameters.tooltip: Filter social media threats by handle name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter social media threats by handle name.

parameters.name: is_verified
parameters.title: Is Verified
parameters.tooltip: Filter all the verified social media threats.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter all the verified social media threats. You can select one of the following options: True, False.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter social media threats by status.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter social media threats by status. You can select one of the following options: Active, False Positive, Takedown, Resolved.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. It is mandatory if end date is given.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by profile added date. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.description: Retrieves the statistics of open bucket exposures.

operations.description: Retrieves the statistics of social media threats.

operations.title: Get Tags
operations.description: Retrieves the list of active tags.

operations.title: Get Takedown Requests
operations.description: Retrieves a list of takedown requests for rogue apps and typo domains for the given organization.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Select the take-down request status from the following options to filter the results.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the take-down request status from the following options to filter the results: Requested, Acknowledged, Initiated, Closed.

parameters.name: category
parameters.title: Category
parameters.tooltip: Select the take-down request category from the following options to filter the results.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the take-down request category from the following options to filter the results:  Phishing, Fraudulentdomains, Typosquatting, RogueApps, Alert.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.title: Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Specify the keyword to filter the results. Provided keyword will be searched in these fields: ticketId, entity (it may be domain name, title of a report, Phished Domain, etc)
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the keyword to filter the results. Provided keyword will be searched in these fields: ticketId, entity (it may be domain name, title of a report, Phished Domain, etc)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date of the range when the takedown was requested. Default is last 6 months.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the start date of the range when the takedown was requested. Default is last 6 months.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date of the range when the takedown was requested. Default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the end date of the range when the takedown was requested. Default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of records to fetch per page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
